sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task ﻿{{73ebd5c3-c7fe-4c6b-bc1b-72a663d79b1a.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of ﻿{{73ebd5c3-c7fe-4c6b-bc1b-72a663d79b1a.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of ﻿{{4c3b1bd2-8e2f-4efe-8824-0f467c683091.property_value}} days.﻿
